i5.las2peer.p2p.pastry

Class ContentEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • rice.p2p.past.ContentHashPastContent
      • i5.las2peer.p2p.pastry.ContentEnvelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, rice.p2p.past.PastContent

    public class ContentEnvelope
extends rice.p2p.past.ContentHashPastContent
    A simple envelope for LAS2peer data to be stored in the p2p network. On knowledge of the class of the contained data the user may use the getContained... methods to get typed access.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
